resources.string: Displays all acoustic punjabi romantic songs.User can then click on individual songs to play. Need a way to display all songs in a dynamic list. Static textview wont work for a long list of songs. On long clicking any song it opens "Now Playing" screen

Displays all Top 50 bollywood songs.User can then click on individual songs to play. Need a way to display all songs in a dynamic list. Static textview wont work for a long list of songs. On long clicking any song it opens "Now Playing" screen

Displays all Matak Matak album songs.User can then click on individual songs to play. Need a way to display all songs in a dynamic list. Static textview wont work for a long list of songs. On long clicking any song it opens "Now Playing" screen
Displays details of currently playing song. Along with Pause/Play and Stop Button. Can also include a share button for an implicit intent

Displays Top 50 punjabi songs.User can then click on individual songs to play. Need a way to display all songs in a dynamic list. Static textview wont work for a long list of songs. On long clicking any song it opens "Now Playing" screen
